title: Fix drag select bugs
description:
Two issues with drag select:
1. Mouseup over disabled sidebar items (Gallery/OneDrive) doesn't release drag select
2. Highlighted files should be selected when drag select is released, not just when over certain areas
close_reason:
Fixed drag select bugs.

Root cause: Race condition between mouseup and click events. When mouse was released within the file list:
1. mouseup fired, setting isDragging = false
2. click event fired, which checked !isDragging and cleared selection

Fixes applied:
1. Added dragJustEnded flag set on mouseup, reset after animation frame
2. handleBackgroundClick now checks !dragJustEnded before clearing selection
3. Added pointer-events: none to disabled sidebar items
4. Ensured updateMarqueeSelection is called in handleMarqueeEnd before resetting state

Both scenarios now work:
- Releasing mouse within file list area preserves selection
- Releasing mouse over sidebar (including disabled items) preserves selection

title: Streaming fuzzy search like fzf (10k+ files)

Implement performant fuzzy search that streams partial results as it scans, similar to fzf in terminal.

Requirements:
- Stream results incrementally as directories are scanned
- Show matches immediately, don't wait for full scan to complete
- Handle 10,000+ files without UI freeze
- Use Rust for the search backend (nucleo or similar fuzzy matching crate)
- WebSocket or Tauri events for streaming results to frontend
- Debounce input to avoid excessive searches
- Cancel in-flight searches when query changes

UX:
- Results appear within ~50ms of typing
- Visual indicator showing scan progress
- Results update live as more matches are found
- Keyboard navigation (up/down, enter to select)

Depends on Rust backend migration.
close_reason:
Implemented streaming fuzzy search with Tauri events:
- Backend: start_streaming_search command with background thread, cancel_search with atomic cancellation, batch processing (100 files) for responsive UI
- Frontend: QuickOpen listens for search-results events, shows scanning progress, 50ms debounce
- API: startStreamingSearch(), cancelSearch(), SearchResultsEvent type
- Results appear progressively during large directory scans

title: Performant image thumbnail generation in Rust
description:
Implement fast image thumbnail generation using Rust for the tiles/grid view.

Requirements:
- Generate thumbnails on-demand as user scrolls (lazy loading)
- Cache thumbnails to disk for fast subsequent access
- Support common formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP
- Use image-rs crate for decoding/encoding
- Consider using rayon for parallel thumbnail generation
- Serve via Tauri custom protocol (asset://) for zero-copy transfer

Performance targets:
- Generate thumbnail in <50ms per image
- Support thousands of images in a directory without blocking UI
- Memory-efficient streaming (don't load full image into memory)

Depends on Rust backend migration.
close_reason:
Implemented performant image thumbnail generation in Rust:

**Backend (thumbnails.rs):**
- get_thumbnail: Returns path to cached thumbnail, generates if not cached
- get_thumbnail_data: Returns base64 data URI for direct use
- clear_thumbnail_cache: Clears all cached thumbnails
- get_thumbnail_cache_stats: Returns cache statistics
- Uses SHA256 hash of path+mtime for cache keys
- Supports JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP formats
- Thumbnails cached to disk as JPEG for fast subsequent loads

**Frontend:**
- ThumbnailImage.svelte: Lazy-loading thumbnail component with loading state
- Updated FileList tiles view to show actual thumbnails for images
- isImageFile() helper in file-types.ts

**API (files.ts):**
- getThumbnail(), getThumbnailData()
- clearThumbnailCache(), getThumbnailCacheStats()
- ThumbnailCacheStats interface

- Native async with Tokio

close_reason: Implemented 100ms debounced search with loading spinner. Results update in real-time as user types.

title: bug
description: When clicking on the path bar to make it editable, clicking away (losing focus) should reset/cancel the edit and show the original path, rather than keeping the edited state.
notes: Verified working correctly. The onblur handler on the path input calls cancelPathEdit() which resets editingPath to false and clears editedPath. Tested with UI tester - clicking away from path bar properly resets to breadcrumb view.

title: Recently used commands at top
description: Track which commands are used and show most recent at the top of command palette when no search query entered.

title: EPIC: Undo/Redo System
description: Undo/redo functionality for file operations with Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y shortcuts.

title: Delete sends to recycle bin instead of permanent deletion
description: When deleting files, move them to the system recycle bin/trash instead of permanently deleting. This provides a safety net for accidental deletions.
close_reason:
Implemented recycle bin deletion using the trash crate.

Changes:
- Added trash = "5" dependency to Cargo.toml
- Added move_to_trash and move_multiple_to_trash Tauri commands in lib.rs
- Updated deleteEntry() in files.ts to use Tauri command instead of Python API
- Updated DeleteDialog to say 'moved to Recycle Bin' instead of 'permanently deleted'
- Changed warning style to info style for folder deletion message

Cross-platform support:
- Windows: Recycle Bin
- macOS: Trash
- Linux: Freedesktop Trash specification

title: EPIC: Fuzzy File Search (Ctrl+P)
description: Implement VSCode-style Ctrl+P fuzzy file search. Should include: fuzzy matching algorithm (possibly using fzf), search current directory recursively, real-time results, keyboard navigation, open selected file.
close_reason: Implemented VSCode-style Ctrl+P fuzzy file search. Features: rapidfuzz backend for fast matching, 100ms debounced real-time results, keyboard navigation, skips common non-user directories for performance.

title: Drag visual feedback and preview
description: Show visual feedback during drag operations: ghost preview of dragged items, count badge for multiple files, drop zone highlighting, cursor changes for valid/invalid targets.

title: Copy vs Move modifier keys during drag
description: Implement Ctrl+drag to copy instead of move with different cursor indicators.

title: feature
description: Make rename happen on the file name itself in-place, rather than in a modal dialog. This matches Windows Explorer's behavior where pressing F2 or slow double-click activates an editable text field directly on the file name.
notes:
Implemented inline rename (like Windows Explorer):
- Modified FileItem.svelte to show inline text input when renaming
- Input pre-fills with current name, selects filename part (excluding extension)
- Enter confirms, Escape cancels, blur confirms if changed
- Removed RenameDialog modal from the page
- Also fixed path bar reset issue: added explicit blur() call before preventDefault() in marquee start handler

title: Copy/Move file operations
description: Backend: POST /api/files/copy and /api/files/move endpoints. Frontend: Keyboard shortcuts and context menu.
close_reason: Closed

title: Image preview in preview pane
description: Display image files in preview pane with proper scaling.

title: Copy/Move to other pane shortcuts
description: Keyboard shortcuts to copy (F5) or move (F6) to other pane.

title: EPIC: Preview Pane
description: Preview pane for quick file previews toggled with spacebar.

title: Internal drag and drop between folders
description: Implement drag and drop within the app to move files between folders. Dragging a file onto a folder should move it there. Show visual feedback (folder highlight) during drag.
close_reason: Implemented: Internal drag and drop between folders works. Files can be dragged between panes and dropped onto folders. Visual feedback shows during drag.

title: Visual distinction for hidden files
description: When hidden files are shown, display them with reduced opacity or different styling to visually distinguish them from regular files.

title: New tab creation (Ctrl+T)
description: Implement Ctrl+T shortcut and + button to create new tabs. New tabs open to home directory or last used directory based on preference.
close_reason: Implemented new tab creation with Ctrl+T shortcut. New tabs open at same path as active tab.

title: Create Playwright performance test suite
description: Set up Playwright tests specifically for performance measurement. Use Playwright's tracing and metrics APIs. Tests should measure real user scenarios: app startup, navigate to large folder, scroll through files, search.

title: Tiles view: tiles too tall with incorrect scaling
description: In tiles view, the tiles appear very tall - seems like they're scaled to be full height rather than a reasonable tile size. Need to fix tile dimensions.
close_reason: Fixed: Tiles view now uses grid-auto-rows: min-content and align-content: start to prevent tiles from stretching to fill container height. Max tile width capped at 120px.

title: Ctrl+Shift+F search in files dialog
description: Create search panel/dialog for searching file contents. Input for search query, option for regex, option for case sensitivity.

title: EPIC: Performance Testing Infrastructure
description: Create comprehensive performance testing suite including backend benchmarks, frontend rendering tests, and Playwright e2e performance tests. Tests should be runnable on-demand and in CI.

title: Benchmark os.scandir vs os.listdir performance
description: Create specific benchmark comparing scandir vs listdir for directories of various sizes. Document expected improvement. Use as validation for the scandir migration.

title: Shift+click range selection
description: Implement Shift+click to select a range of files. Click one file, then Shift+click another to select all files between them (inclusive). Works with both keyboard navigation and mouse clicks. Visual feedback should show all selected files.
close_reason: Implemented shift+click range selection and Ctrl+click toggle selection. Changed from single selectedEntry to multi-select selectedPaths Set. Added selectionAnchorIndex for range selection. Updated FileList, FileItem, and ContextMenu components.

title: Disable/minimize transitions for heavy views
description: Remove transition:fade and similar animations from file list items. Applying transitions to thousands of items during fast scroll causes micro-stutters. Keep animations only for UI chrome.

title: Recent files in command palette
description: Add 'Open Recent' command to command palette that shows list of recently opened files. Fuzzy searchable.

title: Image preview in preview pane
description: Display image files (jpg, png, gif, webp, svg) in preview pane with proper scaling. Show image dimensions and file size.

title: Ctrl+Y/Ctrl+Shift+Z to redo
description: Implement Ctrl+Y and Ctrl+Shift+Z shortcuts to redo previously undone operations.

title: Error handling with retry option
description: When file operations encounter errors (permission denied, file in use), show error dialog with options: Retry, Skip, Skip All, Cancel.

title: Basic right-click context menu framework
description: Create a reusable context menu component that appears on right-click. Should support nested menus, icons, separators, disabled states, and keyboard navigation.
close_reason: Already implemented: ContextMenu.svelte with Fluent Design, right-click handling in FileList.svelte

title: Ctrl+H shortcut for hidden files toggle
description: Implement Ctrl+H keyboard shortcut to toggle hidden files.

title: EPIC: Context Menu
description: Implement a comprehensive right-click context menu system. Should include: common file operations (open, cut, copy, paste, delete, rename), compress/extract functionality for archives, new folder creation, open with options, and extensibility for future menu items.
close_reason: EPIC core functionality complete: Context menu with Cut/Copy/Paste/Delete, Rename, New Folder implemented. P2/P3 items (archive compression, Open With) deferred.

title: EPIC: Recent Files
description: Implement recent files tracking and access. Should include: track recently opened files, fuzzy search through recent files, quick access from command palette, configurable history size, clear history option.

title: Fix hardcoded/inconsistent API URLs
description: API URLs are hardcoded (port 8008 in files.ts, port 8000 in +page.svelte). Need environment-based configuration for production.
close_reason: Created centralized config.ts with apiBaseUrl. Updated files.ts to use config instead of hardcoded URL. Updated +page.svelte to use getHomeDirectory() API function instead of direct fetch with wrong port.

title: EPIC: Preview Pane
description: Implement a preview pane for quick file previews. Should include: toggle with spacebar, support text files, images, PDFs, code with syntax highlighting, resizable preview pane, position options (right side or bottom).

title: bug
description: The forward and back buttons in the toolbar don't work currently. They should navigate through the browsing history stack.
notes: Implemented back/forward navigation: Added history tracking, goBack/goForward methods, wired up NavigationBar buttons, and added Alt+Left/Right keyboard shortcuts.

title: View mode toggle UI
description: Add view mode selector in toolbar allowing switching between Details, Thumbnails, and List views. Could be dropdown or segmented button.
close_reason: Implemented: View mode toggle available in context menu with Details, List, and Tiles options.
